snippet: The second-biggest computer networking company announced its strategy for software defined networks. The specifics aren't all there, but Juniper is hoping to become something like an enterprise software company, without disturbing its original...
abstract: The second-biggest computer networking company announced its strategy for software defined networks. The specifics aren't all there, but Juniper is hoping to become something like an enterprise software company, without disturbing its original business of selling high-margin hardware. The industry is changing quickly, but if it doesn't change too fast, the plan might work.
